string-array.name: opening_messages
string-array.item: I am in charge of how I feel, and today, I am choosing happines.
I love myself, and I will allow myself to be loved fully.
1 in 5 Canadians experience mental health or addiction. You are not alone.
I am in the process of becoming the best version of myself.
My ability to conquer challenges is limitless. My potential to succeed is infinite.
Today I will let go of the past that I do not need and creat the future that I want.
I will face whatever comes today with a positive attitude.
Worrying is using your imagination to create things you do not want.
Do more of what makes you happy.
Positive thoughts generate positive feelings and attract positive life experiences.
